name: ...a loop is a loop is....
description:
...a loop is a loop is... a puzzle platformer where you move with a frame that can be used to wrap around itself.

Explore a short non linear world and solve intricate puzzles to learn to control the power of your loop.

Game controls:

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move
  • Space to fix/unfix the loop.
  • R to restart
  • Tab to fast travel.

This game was developed under 72h for the Ludum Dare 47, with theme "Stuck in a loop". You can rate the game here:  https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/a-loop-is-a-loop-is
